website_summaries.verdict: A great bath toy submarine that is cute and practical.
pros: Handle on top makes this submarine easy for a child to run through the water in a pool or tub
A sturdy toy that can last for years
Older kids may still enjoy it
cons: The sub comes in two color schemes
Double check the "top" color before you buy

website_summaries.verdict: Sinking submarine made from recycled materials.
pros: Parents who are concerned about the wastefulness of plastic toys love that this submarine is made completely out of recycled materials like plastic milk jugs
The cabin opens for cleaning and is even dishwasher safe
Water can spin the propeller in the back
The submarine can float when empty and sink when filled with water
Parents love using it as a rinsing tool, since it has a wide opening at the front for scooping and pouring
cons: A larger toy, so it is recommended for older babies 6 months and older

customer_reviews.title: Surprisingly fun.
customer_reviews.text: I am Dada, not the three-year-old, but if this is left in the tub when I have a bath, and no one is watching, I may play with it. If you know what you are doing, you can get the water going in the front to make the propeller spin around. Just saying.
customer_reviews.author: Uncle Odie

customer_reviews.title: Safety seems to have been corrected
customer_reviews.text: First toy we have bought from this manufacturer. very pleased with how well built it seems to be. of course it cost a bit more than a normal cheap toy but it seems like it's going to last. for anyone concerned about the fingers getting stuck the one that we just got has been redesigned. I'll try and take a picture but unless you have extremely small fingers they closed in the holes leaving only small openings for the water drainage. (Unless this design is what people are talking about with fingers getting stuck?)
customer_reviews.author: Bill Monica

customer_reviews.title: Great for rinsing your kiddos in the tub!
customer_reviews.text: My 2yo daughter just got this for Christmas and thus far, it's been a hit with her, my almost 4yo son, and myself. My son particularly loves the moving propeller in the back. I love it as a rinsing tool. My son has the tug boat which I've been using, but its spout is narrow. The submarine has a nice wide opening which makes rinsing SO much easier!! I wish I had had this to begin with. So if you're debating between the tug boat and sub, I'd highly recommend the sub. It floats on the water's surface just like the tug boat, plus the top yellow part opens so the kid can put other toys inside if he/she wants.
customer_reviews.author: H. Kittleman

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous toy, and safety issue has been fixed.
customer_reviews.text: The safety issue mentioned in another review appears to have been corrected. The windows now have plastic blocking them so that a child can no longer get their finger stuck. (See photo) Aside from that, this toy is on par with all the toys from this manufacturer - EXCELLENT. Completely recycled, recyclable, made in the USA, durable and sturdy... There is nothing bad I can find to say about any of these toys.
customer_reviews.author: A. Baker

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Great addition to our bath time toys! Knew I would love it so much, I ordered the tug boat the next day and I was right! It’s a durable, bright colored and fun toy!
customer_reviews.author: MommaHack

customer_reviews.title: My 4 year old twins love this toy
customer_reviews.text: My son asked for a submarine to take in the pool with him and I surprised him with this toy. He absolutely loves it. His sister loves it too. They have banged it around the pool deck and the pool steps and it has held up perfectly. They play with it in the bathtub too and then I dry it and off it goes to the playroom. I definitely got my money’s worth from this toy. I like all the Green Toys products, and this one does not disappoint.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy

customer_reviews.title: Great materials, easy to clean, kid loves them!
customer_reviews.text: We use these as pool and bath toys. Seriously nothing bad to say about them. I will continue to purchase more for my daughter.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany Baldwin

customer_reviews.title: Love the quality!
customer_reviews.text: I love this toy! It is sturdy and fun! It floats on top of the water, or is fun underneath as well! I love that it pours so I can use it to wash LO's hair, but it also is a supervised toy since it means he can dump water over the side. The toy itself is very sturdy and I am not worried about it getting broken. It also comes apart so I can clean it if needed. I plan on buying more from this line.
customer_reviews.author: Erica

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality and easy to clean
customer_reviews.text: I do not leave allot of reviews but thought I'd take the time for this product. I purchased several green toys for my grandson. To use in his pool and in the bath tub. First the quality is excellent and the functionality as far as cleaning is easy. He is really enjoying playing with these. I can see them lasting a very long time. Would buy again and will continue to buy from green toys
customer_reviews.author: Russ Hughes

customer_reviews.title: Green Toys are Fun and Durable and this is no exception!
customer_reviews.text: My kids have had Green Toys for years, so when it was time to pick something out for my 3 year old for his 4th birthday, it was a no brainer. Gave him this right before going to the beach. He loves it. Spent all week playing with it in the sand and salt water. Easy to clean and no concerns over rust since there is no metal. A lot of fun on the beach, in the pool, and in the house as well. Just a great purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Megan

customer_reviews.title: fun in the pool or bathtub
customer_reviews.text: Cute, fun in the pool or bathtub, durable. The little windows aren't open circles, they're blocked off with little slits for water to pass through so no risk of fingers getting stuck. I read some reviews of people complaining about little fingers getting stuck in the windows, so I figured I would mention our model isn't like that.
customer_reviews.author: Julia C

customer_reviews.title: Happy toddler
customer_reviews.text: My toddler loves this more than any of his other bath toys. He gets super excited about the "blub" sound it makes when he fills it with water, and loves pouring the water out of the windows. It doesn't do much more than that, so I'm not sure why he likes it so much, but if he's happy. I'm happy! I also like that the openings are big enough so that it dries completely and won't mold. Although it's a submarine, it still floats even when it's filled completely with water and will not sink.
customer_reviews.author: Surreptrixious

customer_reviews.title: Love this brand!
customer_reviews.text: We bought this submarine for my son for his Easter basket this year. He loves it! I love the Green Toys brand. I buy almost all of their products for my children. They are built with such sturdy and reliable materials. They do not feel cheap and plasticy at ALL! I also love that they aren't covered in bells and whistles and need tons of different batteries. These are toys that we grew up on. Toys that make children use their imaginations. I love them!
customer_reviews.author: celialou

customer_reviews.title: a great simple, yet fun, bath toy
customer_reviews.text: Great toy, our was slightly warped/imperfect but didn't affect functionality so we didn't bother exchanging it. It was several months before I realized that you could open the submarine up and put figures inside. I really like the simplicity of the Green Toys vehicle line; no batteries, noises, etc. We also have the dump truck, fire truck, and sea plane. I would say the dump truck is the biggest hit (we bring it to the sand box) and this submarine is the second favorite. I like that the plastic is durable and high-quality; we've had to throw out many other bath toys for growing mildew but this one has been fine for 6 months and counting.
customer_reviews.author: MK

customer_reviews.title: Now that they come apart for cleaning these are the BOMB!
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift I was excited to give and seemed like it was exciting to receive as well. I always try and get Green Toys for new babies because I know they can chew on them without fear. They're sturdy and dishwasher safe. I rarely if ever buy from someone's registry, because Green Toys are always so much better than what most new parents pick.
customer_reviews.author: StoneHenge

customer_reviews.title: Durable and eco-friendly
customer_reviews.text: We initially bought this as a pool toy, but it never made it that far & has become a bath time favorite. Our 2 year old love sinking it and pouring water out of the “spout”, as she runs her fingers under the falling water. It’s a great sensory toy! As an eco-conscious parent, it makes me feel good to know it’s made of recycled milk bottles and is also Made in the USA = win/win!
customer_reviews.author: Amy Tucker

customer_reviews.title: Perfecf bath toy
customer_reviews.text: My daughter couldn't wait for me to get it out of the box was it arrived. It's very sturdy and durable and has provided hours of fun for my 3 year old. Plus it's easy to maintain and clean especially with a 3 year who loves bath time like she is some type of fish. This has provided hours of enjoyment and like I mentioned it's so easy to clean. It easily snaps apart and wipe down so far it hasn't grown any mold. Plus I love the fact that it's made from recycled milk jugs.
customer_reviews.author: Ally

customer_reviews.title: can't go wrong with Green Toys
customer_reviews.text: Green Toys are fantastic toys for the tub because they are so easy to clean. I love that you can just pop them right in the dishwasher to kill off all the bath time yuck. My girls are 4 and 2, they have a ton of Green Toys and we usually gift them to our friends as well. The price is decent and I like that they are made from recycled materials.
customer_reviews.author: J. Donahue

customer_reviews.title: Durable, fun, long lasting
customer_reviews.text: We have now had this toy for two years. It is a favorite at bath times! Not only is it fun to play with, it also acts as a pretty nice water pourer. Very impressed with the quality! No sharp parts. After two years of hard play, it still looks new! Great toddler/preschool toy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Brilliantly designed submarine water toy!
customer_reviews.text: We bought a collection of Green Toy toys for our 18 month old boy, including this submarine. We really love it. The toy is so versatile and well thought out. It is extremely durable and floats well. The idea of having a handle on the top is brilliant. The handles lets our little boy use the submarine as a pitcher -- as well as a boat --to water plants and to pour water into other vessels. Like the other GT toys, there are not metal parts or sharp edges. It is a really classy toy. Can't say enough good things about it. So far, we have not found any negatives.
customer_reviews.author: Misha

customer_reviews.title: Green toys are the best!
customer_reviews.text: This was a birthday gift for our 1 year old grandson who took it to bed with his the first night and loves playing with it on his water table outside! I don't know if it has made it up to the bathtub yet! It is made from recycled milk bottles and I love that!
customer_reviews.author: C. L. Hornung

customer_reviews.title: great
customer_reviews.text: my son loves this! i thought it was just a boat toy when i got it but its a spout for pouring water over your childs head in the bath. the only downside is that it doesn't exactly come apart like other versions to clean properly. i have to boil it to get it clean
customer_reviews.author: Amber Hall

customer_reviews.title: Awesome bath toy
customer_reviews.text: The toys from this company are sturdy and fun. My triplets play with them all the time. Having three boys (2 years old as I write this) means lots of rough play, and these toys are durable and can handle all the drops, crashes, and booms.
customer_reviews.author: P. Coots

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful purchase!
customer_reviews.text: Seriously sturdy toy! Great value and it helps knowing it was made from 100% recycled materials and that it can be washed in the dishwasher! This toy feels like it could be passed on for decades, the quality is so good
customer_reviews.author: carrie karr

customer_reviews.title: I love products by this company.
customer_reviews.text: I actually purchased a few of these for this year's Toys for Tots program. They are good quality and a good sale price. My granddaughters also have one in their tub.
customer_reviews.author: KAREN K.

customer_reviews.title: Defective handle, but 10 month old loves it
customer_reviews.text: We use it to rinse our 10 month old during bath time. He loves it, despite minor defect. I uploaded a video, basically any time the sub is submerged and you try to pick it up the handle pops open. Since the product is made to be submerged I'm pretty sure this is not supposed to happen. Requested a replacement, will update.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: This is the cutest little submarine. Love that it can be used as a pouring device to wash soap out of my son’s hair. Also love that the propellers actually spin when you push it through the water. It’s really well made and not like the cheap plastic materials that a lot of bath toys seem to be made of. It’s very thick and sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Jenna

customer_reviews.title: Great for bath time!
customer_reviews.text: My 2 year old daughter really enjoys this during bath time. The spinning propeller and mouth of submarine working like a pitcher to pour water out are the best parts.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: 1.5 and 3 year old love it
customer_reviews.text: My 1.5 and 3 year olds both love the submarine in the bath. I got this and the green airplane from the same marker but they both favor the submarine more. They really enjoy sinking it and pouring water out of the front mouth. Great buy for the price
customer_reviews.author: J.

customer_reviews.title: Durable and fun
customer_reviews.text: Another high quality bath toy! Both my one and three year old love playing with this in the bathtub. The spinning propeller and small opening on top are fun. This is very durable and easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: My 2 year old loves it
customer_reviews.text: Such a great toy! My son has the red and yellow boat by Green Toys and loved it so I thought I would get him this too. I do wish that the bottom was a bit deeper as the second you pull it out of the water the water starts pouring out of the mouth. Unlike the boat that will hold a good amount of water before you tip it to dump it.
customer_reviews.author: PridefulWiccan

customer_reviews.title: Fun!
customer_reviews.text: My 2 year old grandson had a blast playing with this. It will float, but they can sink it and run underwater, dump water from the front. The handle made it easy for him to hold onto the boat.
customer_reviews.author: Dawn M. Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy construction and fun play
customer_reviews.text: My son LOVES this submarine. He dunks it in the water then pulls it back up to watch all the water leave it. By far his favorite bath toy, so naturally we love it too! Also well made and super sturdy b
customer_reviews.author: Mandi

customer_reviews.title: The perfect bath toy.
customer_reviews.text: This was a replacement for the green toys boat, which lasted us a good 4 years of daily use! These are durable, fun, and useful bath toys for washing kids hair. I've started giving them as baby shower gifts because we love them so! My only complaint is not being able to get them open for a good scrub, so mildew will eventually build up. I would periodically mix a small amount of bleach in water and soak our bath toys, which generally keeps the slime at bay.
customer_reviews.author: K. Garvey

customer_reviews.title: Stuck Fingers
customer_reviews.text: I love Green Toys, and we own most of them. However, my son has gotten his fingers stuck in the holes on this submarine several times now. I finally had to take it away since it's getting harder to get his fingers out. I will continue to buy Green Toys , but this one needs modifications.
customer_reviews.author: KK

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Bought it as a Christmas gift for my son and all other gifts arrived on time but this one never arrived. Very disappointed because I like this toys brand a lot.
customer_reviews.author: Momo Mama

customer_reviews.title: Super durable and dishwasher safe
customer_reviews.text: Love this toy! Much better than expected. Love that it’s recycled material but super durable. Can have some spots from it being recycled but I don’t mind. Love that it can open all the way up and go in the dishwasher!
customer_reviews.author: Kristal Spelling

customer_reviews.title: My son loves it!!
customer_reviews.text: A simple toy, excellently made, and recycled from other plastics!! This toy is very well made, has an opening at the front to create a waterfall effect, and my son just loves to play in the bath with his submarine. PROS: Very well made Eco-friendly :) Not painted, the plastic is actually colored which is a plus for water play Encourages creative/imaginative play No frills, no batteries needed Cons: There aren't any!!! :) Thank you Green Toys for making such an astounding toy!! We will purchase from Green Toys again!!
customer_reviews.author: Satske

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Love this brand. Looks great, durable and environmentally responsible. I have 3 toys of this brand and my twins love it!!! It will float for a long time but you can also fill with water and pull pour out too! Great for beach, pool and paddling pool! Other kids always want to play w it too which I like because they ask and my kids can interact with them.
customer_reviews.author: Janine

customer_reviews.title: He wouldn't put it down!
customer_reviews.text: A gift for my son for Christmas - "he loves it" would be an understatement. He wouldn't put it down, he was certain it was bath night (it wasn't), and if we'd let him, he would probably have taken it into bed as a stuffie, too. Love that the hatch on top opens and the recycled plastic idea. We have several Green Toys (dump truck, tea sets, dish sets, float plane) and have been so happy with them. They are nearly indestructible (ours have yet to be destroyed) - love no batteries, noises, electronics in toys for kids so they can use their imaginations.
customer_reviews.author: Hurley Girl's Mum

customer_reviews.title: Made in America.  Recycled.  Minimalist.
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy, cute, fun, durable. Nothing fancy, no batteries, no parts to break, but good for a little water fun.
customer_reviews.author: William Dukes

customer_reviews.title: A fun bath toy!
customer_reviews.text: My 2 year old loves it. I didn’t realize water pours out of the front, so you can also use it to rinse your little one.
customer_reviews.author: Natalie Peterkin

customer_reviews.title: Too hard to open hatch!
customer_reviews.text: I was very disappointed in this as due to the difficulty of opening up the “hatch”( even for myself!) my 3 and 1/2 year old grandson became too frustrated. Every time he tried it was to hard to open! So, if it was hard for me and frustrated me, I understood his frustration! He has autism so due to the company catering to children with special needs I was baffled why the product wasn’t easier to play with.
customer_reviews.author: Lori Tognoni

customer_reviews.title: Nicely made
customer_reviews.text: Took this on vacation and my son played with it constantly. Also his favorite toy in the bath. Really well made and pretty cool.
customer_reviews.author: Drew Pare

customer_reviews.title: Great bath tub toy
customer_reviews.text: We own a few Green Toys. My 1YO loves their tugboat as a bath toy. I saw this and knew it would be a hit. He does indeed like it! The handle is a great size. The handle and conning tower come up on a hinge. The propeller turns and is also quite nicely designed with twisted foils! It sits level on dry ground and of course floats. It's easy to drain of bathwater. You can easily pop the hull apart to clean old bathwater out.
customer_reviews.author: Micah Epps

customer_reviews.title: Kids love this toy in the bath!
customer_reviews.text: This is a really well made toy, I was very pleased with it when it arrived. My kids both have been playing with it in the bath, along with the green toys boat. The only complaint I have, and it goes for both toys, is that the water won't drain out on its own after draining the bath tub. The water will just sit in it and could mildew if you don't make sure to dump it. It has a pour spout to empty the water out, so its not a huge deal, but would be less hassle if I didn't have to drain them. Still a really nice toy.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Dalton

customer_reviews.title: Boys love this toy!
customer_reviews.text: Tacoma Children's museum had several of these along with other Green Toys, my 3 year old grandson played with it for an hour and when we pulled them out of that section, he wanted to take it with him! Now he has his own for bath time! Safe and entertaining in a water environment.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Kerr

customer_reviews.title: Great simple, fun water toy.
customer_reviews.text: Great simple, fun water toy. We use ours in both the bath and outside. It is easy to clean and durable. They were on sale for great price, I bought two so my kids(4yrs and 2yrs) wouldn't fight.
customer_reviews.author: The Hallmans

customer_reviews.title: Transitional
customer_reviews.text: These toys can go from tub to toy room to pool. My son absolutely loves them. He also has the boat and helicopter,
customer_reviews.author: Anna

customer_reviews.title: My two year old loves this toy!
customer_reviews.text: My friend recommended Green Toys to me and I looked into them--all their products seem adorable. My friend has quite a few so I knew they were durable and fun. The submarine is so cute, and my two-year old son loves it. He has to have it in the bath, and also enjoys playing with it outside of the bath too. It also can be used to scoop and pour water, which is much more fun than the plastic cup I've been using for that purpose ;). I've had it for a few months now and it's held up great, even with the rambunctious-ness of a toddler!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Omfg
customer_reviews.text: Wow. Just wow. Super simple. Easy to clean. Inexpensive. Quality made Already one of his favorites.
customer_reviews.author: buf0rd

customer_reviews.title: Floating bath toy
customer_reviews.text: My son plays with it for 5 minute we bathe him. He's 10 months. and needs three or four toys floating in shallow bath water so he can be distracted while washing his hair and bathing. The toys all float. And so does this one. But it also submerges without floating if water goes inside the float. It would be educational for 2 year old. I like it letting my son play with it. Has a handle so he doesn't rub his hair or face covered in soap and put soap in his mouth. Design is cute and durable. I use it along with bath matt that is made of foam to help him not slip or fall.
customer_reviews.author: Parker Knight

customer_reviews.title: 100% recycled plastic awesomeness!
customer_reviews.text: Any toy that's made from 100% recycled milk jugs is awesome. This toy is just particularly way awesomer. It's got everything... a rotating propellerator, a handle, a top that opens up to reveal a pretty unsurprising barren landscape of yellow and blue plastic... its elegant rugged beauty adds to its mystique and kinda boringness. It even stays afloat in water until it sinks.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Kolodzie

customer_reviews.title: Fun toy!
customer_reviews.text: My son had a blast playing with this toy during bath time. I didn't realize it was pretty big. The toy having a ton of holes for water to drain out of was a big plus. Great toy!
customer_reviews.author: DogLover

customer_reviews.title: Great bath toy.  Even better pool toy.
customer_reviews.text: We used to use this in the bath, but now that my son is older, we've started using it outdoors in our pool. The toy has withstood the Texas summer sun and heat, our new puppy, and the chlorination beautifully. It is the perfect size for toddlers. The hatch that opens/closes and propellor that spins are just enough to make the toy interesting, not frustratingly over-complicated. Material is cool to touch even after baking in the sun all day.
customer_reviews.author: JTC

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Bath Toy
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my 18mo son for Christmas. Was surprised at how solid the construction of this sub is. The plastic feels very durable and has a nice texture to it. He loves playing with it, and there are so many different ways he can play with it. The handle on top was a very smart feature to put on it, but a little small for my man-sized hands. If you are asking why that matters seeing as it's a kids toy, the reason is because this also makes an excellent rinsing tool. Pouring the water out of it's "mouth" is the best way to rinse the shampoo off his head that I have found! Would definitely recommend this!
customer_reviews.author: An Outlaw

customer_reviews.title: Cute bath toy!
customer_reviews.text: We got this as a gift for our 3 year old nephew who loves transportation toys and bath toys. This is one of his new favorite bath toys. It’s very cute, but a bit larger than I expected.
customer_reviews.author: T Simoneaux

customer_reviews.title: You have to get will last years
customer_reviews.text: Top opens up as if people actually would climb in My kids loved opening it to let water out Handle great size for all ages Super fun Has windows covered partially so no small fingers can get in Use outside and inside just super well made
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: 10/10 would recommend
customer_reviews.text: Excellent bath time toy and I love that I can pop it in the dishwasher to clean it! My 2yr old son LOVES this brand so much.
customer_reviews.author: L E Harrison

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and good for rinsing hair!
customer_reviews.text: Great quality and works really well to rinse shampoo from their hair! The opening in the front for the water to pour out is wide so it creates a nice flow to rinse shampoo. My son also loves to play with it along with his tugboat. I do however find it difficult to open up and clean. It can get grimey inside and is difficult to get in there to clean it. Wish there was an easier way!
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: So cute!! Love this for bath time! It was an Easter gift for my daughter. She LOVES the bath and LOVES this toy. Lots of fun! Always great quality from Green Toys!
customer_reviews.author: Couponanimal

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: I cannot say enough about these toys.... sturdy, large in size, durable, easy to clean, easy to gift....
customer_reviews.author: gwen

customer_reviews.title: Great bath toy
customer_reviews.text: This is a great bath toy. It is quite durable. The colors are bright. Our kids love filling it with water, and pouring out the water (again and again)!
customer_reviews.author: MOMama

customer_reviews.title: kewl item.
customer_reviews.text: works great but gets four stars because the tab on the yellow tower has sharp edges on it and is VERY tough to press in in-order to open the top open, which is hinged at the rear. once the kids see that the top opens, they will continuously bug you to open it and the tab is VERY stiff. when sub is filled with water, it does not sink...it just stays below the waterline.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for 1 or 6 year old
customer_reviews.text: Both my 1 year old and 6 year old love it either in the tub or in the pool.
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: Well built and kid approved
customer_reviews.text: This is my kids' favorite toy to play with at the water table. It works as a scoop for the water and you can pour it out the front or the holes in the sides. Simple and rugged design. This will outlast any other water toys.
customer_reviews.author: Ralk

customer_reviews.title: Clean/ no milldew after mths of playing in the bath
customer_reviews.text: My 19mth old has been playing with this for mths during bath time. No black milldew unlike other toys
customer_reviews.author: Tony

customer_reviews.title: Fun for bathtime!
customer_reviews.text: My little guy is 2 and loves the submarine..he seems to enjoy playing with it during bathtime. Its perfect for rinsing his hair, seems safe in regards to small parts/swallowing. Cleaning thoroughly may be a bit tough, but I usually just rinse it with soap/water and air dry which seems ok so far.
customer_reviews.author: Catherine J Matthes

customer_reviews.title: Very nice toy but I have minor quibbles
customer_reviews.text: My daughter's new favorite bath toy. I would have given it 5 stars except the handle comes unlatched sometimes under the weight of water when you are trying to pour with it - and just a suggestion for the manufacturer, if you had a hole in the back near the propeller, tipping the toy up would make the water run out and spin the propeller which would be fun for kids.
customer_reviews.author: Ethosian

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for my son (5) who usualy doesn't like vehicles. The simplicity is perfect.
customer_reviews.text: My five year old son loves this submarine. He is generally not interested in vehicles of any kind, more interested in guys and small pieces (like playmobile). I'm very glad he likes this (and the Green Toys helicopter and boat). I think the simplicity is part of why he likes these vehicles as opposed to Hotwheels, Thomas, and the like, he can tell whatever story he wants to tell about them. They accompany him to every bathtime, outside, in the car, at the park, and sometimes to bed.
customer_reviews.author: K. Stomberg

customer_reviews.title: Green Toys Submarine
customer_reviews.text: My son absolutely adores this toy! They are very sturdy, & I love that they are made from recycled milk jugs here in the USA. I bought this and the tugboat for bath toys, as the 2 green toys airplanes he already has were big hits. This sub has a handle from which you can pour water out the wide front opening (great for shampoo rinsing!), and also a propeller he loves to spin & pour water on to make spin! They float nicely, and I see my 1 year old having fun with these for years to come!
customer_reviews.author: CMW

customer_reviews.title: High quality
customer_reviews.text: My kids love the green toys I bought for bath time. I purchased several and I’m very happy I got these. They come apart so they can be cleaned easily and they are very durable.
customer_reviews.author: Readingridinghood

customer_reviews.title: Great toy for bath time!
customer_reviews.text: This is such a great bath toy! Our son loves playing with the submarine in the bath. It's a lot larger than I thought based on the picture, but I like it. It's large enough for him to handle easily but light enough for him to pour the water out without any issues. The design is really well thought out and because of this, you don't have to worry about anything getting mold or mildew. We highly recommend this toy for bath time!
customer_reviews.author: Sutton2013

customer_reviews.title: Latch doesn't work
customer_reviews.text: I love this and it is a nice little bath toy but it pops open on its own when it gets picked up. The little latch on it doesn't hold very well.
customer_reviews.author: alyssa01

customer_reviews.title: Best Toy Sub I've Bought All Year
customer_reviews.text: I rarely post serious reviews, but this toy is worthy of one. So, if I had the time of patience I would do a whole in depth analysis of how awesome this toy is and how wonderful this purchase has been. I don't have the time of patience though and something tells me you aren't even reading about this product because it's a plastic submarine. It should be highly rated and if it's age appropriate for your kid chances are they will like it.
customer_reviews.author: Mr_Mom

customer_reviews.title: Great little submarine!
customer_reviews.text: Our 1 year old loves his new submarine! Perfect for bath time or in the pool. We love that the top opens up so that it doesn't grow mold like so many other bath toys do....it's also a great size - not too big, not too small.
customer_reviews.author: Georgia58

customer_reviews.title: Great bath toy
customer_reviews.text: My son refuses to get out of bathtub because of this toy :D.
customer_reviews.author: Manh Vo

customer_reviews.title: Nice for bath
customer_reviews.text: Cool toy. My 2.5yo nephew loves to bring it to the bath with him. That’s one form of transportation he didn’t have yet so he was excited
customer_reviews.author: VMS

customer_reviews.title: Durable plastic
customer_reviews.text: My son loves this toy in the bath. I love that it is made from recycled plastic and here in the U.S.A. Very durable as well.
customer_reviews.author: S. Libbey

customer_reviews.title: The boy loves it
customer_reviews.text: It's made in the USA from milk cartons. It's fun, well designed, and great for pouring water over my little one to rinse the suds. It is solid and he plays with it outside bath time. Got it for six so watch for the price flux.
customer_reviews.author: DenverDawg

customer_reviews.title: Good bath toy
customer_reviews.text: I have a two yo granddaughter and she loves it. She likes to fly it around out of the bath too.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome open ended toy
customer_reviews.text: Definitely most loved Christmas gift this year for my 5 year old (his younger brother got the Green Toys plane... also very well loved). They sleep with them and play with them everywhere. Let those imaginations take over! Also, before I purchased I was concerned because only one reviewer had said the finger-getting-stuck-in-the-submarine problem had been fixed but it's true. They have a second layer of plastic that won't allow in any little fingers.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Great toy!!!
customer_reviews.text: My toddler LOVES this toy. Huge, huge hit! Very durable and well made.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle

customer_reviews.title: What's not to love?!
customer_reviews.text: Lightweight for little hands to play with and enjoy, helps Mom rinse hair and body, made from recycled materials...and it is reasonably priced too!! Great product!
customer_reviews.author: J Shackelford

customer_reviews.title: My four year old grandson enjoy it in his bath
customer_reviews.text: I think he will also enjoy them this summer in his wading pool.
customer_reviews.author: LRL

customer_reviews.title: Great Toy
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my little grandbaby monster. He like to be all boy and play rough and these were a perfect fit for his little hands and have held up great. I bought 3 different ones at first and will continue to buy him all the vehicles.I really like the idea of recycling old plastic and after seeing the high quality of these Im a Green Toys fan
customer_reviews.author: dsmithjr

customer_reviews.title: Great toy the kids love!
customer_reviews.text: My 4 yr old and 1 yr old love this toy! They fight over it! They use it in the tub, pool and water table. It is sturdy, easy to clean and best of all it hold my kids attention! I even bought one for my nephew as a gift. Would highly recommend it and definitely would buy again! We also owe the tug boat, plane and tea set this company makes and they are all fantastic toys.
customer_reviews.author: Kristina

customer_reviews.title: My 1 year old loves this bath toy
customer_reviews.text: My 1 year old loves this submarine! It’s big and easy to hold onto with his small fingers. He always picks it out to play with out of all of his bath toys!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This is now a bath and out of bath toy.
customer_reviews.text: The toddler I bought this for LOVES it. It has become a bath and out of bath toy. Dries easy and same color as the picture. Also the hatch opens up which I didnt read, but a super fun part of it.
customer_reviews.author: Autumn

customer_reviews.title: Fun bath tub addition
customer_reviews.text: We love all of our green toys. This is no exception. My 2 and 5 year old have a blast with this in the bath tub.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon M.

customer_reviews.title: Christmas gift
customer_reviews.text: This is for my grandson for Christmas. I think he will love it!
customer_reviews.author: B. A. Clair

customer_reviews.title: Hasn't become boring, even after a year of use!
customer_reviews.text: We bought this submarine for my then 4 year-old. He loved it from the very beginning and still uses it every time he takes a bath (it's been over a year since we got it). Our younger son is now one year old and he plays with it too. They play with it in very different ways but enjoy it a lot. We use it also to rinse shampoo and soap while bathing them so it is actually useful, not just fun. It's easy to clean, too!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fun and Functional
customer_reviews.text: This is my go to birthday gift for children ages 1-3... Although my four year old just got it for Christmas and even he isn't too old for it. Mama loves it too because it doubles as a hair rinsing tool. Bonus is that it opens up so it can be thoroughly cleaned... And I think we both know that is a rarity when it comes to bath toys that typically have a short life thanks to mold.
customer_reviews.author: J. Whitehead

customer_reviews.title: Like all the green toys we've owned
customer_reviews.text: Like all the green toys we've owned, this toy is sturdy and simple. My 3 year old loves brining this to the pool to play with as well as using it in his bath and water table outside. He floats it like a boat and pours water with it. The simple color scheme is beautiful and the shape of the mouth and position of the top yellow part indicate a face which makes it even cuter.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen

customer_reviews.title: We all live in a green submarine
customer_reviews.text: Green toys is one of my go to toy brands for my son. The prices and quality have never disappointed me. I love this little submarine, which isn't so little! It's a great size, and floats in the tub. The many ports for pouring water are appreciated in keeping my toddler happy, and the handle lets him carry it around out of the tub too. :) Another winner in our fleet. :)
customer_reviews.author: Melaina Lara

customer_reviews.title: Lots of fun and useful.
customer_reviews.text: I originally received this as a baby shower gift and have since given it to two people at their showers. It’s a fun toy but it is also great for pouring water over little bodies to rinse soap and shampoo away. We use it every single time my son takes a bath.
customer_reviews.author: Muppetjenny

customer_reviews.title: Great Bath Toy!
customer_reviews.text: My grandson loves this toy. We have so much fun with it in the tub. The top opens so he can put little guys in it and use it like a boat. Also we dunk it and it pours out different streams of water. This is really a durable and fun bath toy.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Jackson

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful toy
customer_reviews.text: Loved the totally recycled aspect. Grandpa was a submarine engineer and we love implementing subs whenever we can.
customer_reviews.author: Steven Neuman

customer_reviews.title: So cool!
customer_reviews.text: Who could rate a green toy less than 5 stars. These things are awesome! And cool! I purchased this as a gift for my 2 year old nephew and he can't take a bath without it!
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: Great bath tub toy
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with all the green toys I’ve purchased. They are durable and serve a purpose. This is the perfect bath tube toy for any kid. It will last them a long time because these green toys are practically indistructable.
customer_reviews.author: utefan

product_meta.title: Submarine in Yellow & Blue - BPA Free, Phthalate Free, Bath Toy with Spinning Rear Propeller. Safe Toys for Toddlers, Babies
feature_bullets: Safe Watercraft: this pool toy is made using 100% earth friendly material like plastic milk jugs. It contains no BPA, Phthalate and is PVC safe. It meets FDA standards to offer safety even when your toddler happens to lick it

Easy to clean: the toddler toy can be conveniently cleaned. Cabin of this submarine toy can be opened for easy cleaning and is dishwasher safe. This toy can be easily cleaned using baby soap or a shampoo

Pool Playing Toy Use: this water toy will help your kids or toddlers explore the terrain at the bottom of their tub. It will also help them enjoy their nautical journey. Wide mouth opening will allow the kids to enjoy scooping and pouring

Toy Submarine Features: pool toy highlights a spinning rear propeller with flat bottom to offer stability. It features a classic handle that will help your kid to maintain a strong grip that may also help in improving their pincer grip
Earth Friendly Packing: even the packing has been done using earth friendly materials. It is packed using recycled materials and printed using soy inks — a crucial step towards safety of environment
Made in the USA from 100% recycled milk jugs
US supply chain reduces greenhouse gas and saves energy
Floats great in the bathtub and pool
